Notes: If in mono, order the same as DTIN1, Or use T in TRS for input with a Y splitter cable.
If in mono, order the same as DTIN1, Or use R in TRS for output with a Y splitter cable.
If you want to make as many caps be 50V then this one is slightly larger: https://www.taydaelectronics.com/47uf-50v-105c-radial-electrolytic-capacitor-6x11mm.html
The main link is a bit of a tight fit. If you want to have just 25V of limit then this one is a bit thinner: https://www.taydaelectronics.com/100uf-25v-105c-radial-electrolytic-capacitor-6x11mm.html
Entirely optional if you don’t want to deal with Ping Pong. Just short this section with a cut leg of a resistor.
Double check the input but this one has the longer lead be + on the common standard center-negative guitar pedal power input that many use.
The holes on this one are a bit wide because whoops.
